xmlText.p: Second Period_1, St. Louis, Barbashev 3, 4:38. Penalties_Shaw, MTL, (holding), 7:24; Petry, MTL, (tripping), 12:25.

Third Period_2, St. Louis, Berglund 8 (Parayko, Thompson), 5:14 (pp). 3, St. Louis, Steen 12 (Brodziak), 17:43 (sh). 4, Montreal, Hudon 8 (Gallagher), 18:53 (pp). Penalties_Montreal bench, served by Hudon (too many men on the ice), 3:25; Parayko, STL, Major (boarding), 17:26.

Goalies_Montreal, Price 14-19-4 (31 shots-29 saves). St. Louis, Hutton 14-4-1 (34-33).
Referees_Dan O'Rourke, Tim Peel. Linesmen_Darren Gibbs, Libor Suchanek.
